function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large gatherings allowed without restrictions","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and rapid spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforcement of restrictions on the size of public gatherings, implementation of distancing measures","Technologies":"Online event hosting platforms, contact tracing apps","People":"General public, event organizers","Owner":"Government, event organizers"},{"Description":"Lack of social distancing measures","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission in close proximity","Mitigation":"Public education on the importance of social distancing, enforcement of distancing rules","Technologies":"Public announcements, social distancing detection technology","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, health organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to implement school closures","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among students and faculty","Mitigation":"Mandating school closures, providing alternative remote learning options","Technologies":"Remote learning platforms, virtual classroom software","People":"Students, teachers, school staff","Owner":"Government, educational institutions"}]}
